description:
If you're looking for an instructor to wow you with tales of his success as an author on Amazon Kindle, and a course that will describe to you all the joys and financial benefits of being a published author, then I'm afraid you're at the wrong place.

This course is about one thing and one thing only - teaching you how to get your eBook published on Amazon Kindle within the next 60 minutes. Here's how we will be accomplishing that goal:

You'll be provided with a quick introduction on getting started with Kindle, and then we'll be diving straight into the process of getting your eBook ready for publication. We've broken down the entire process into three easy steps:

  1. Formatting Your eBook
  2. Creating Your Cover
  3. Submitting Your eBook for Publication

After you have completed this process, we have then also provided you with all the tools & resources you will need to successfully promote and market your eBook to generate maximum profits.

So, are you ready? Then let's go! The clock is ticking...
title: Launch Your Kindle eBook in 60 Minutes With Kindle Direct
